name: Meltdown in 30
description:
The nuclear reactor is on the verge of a meltdown!

Collect cooling rods and return them to the central cooling system before the whole place explodes!

Move with WASD or Arrow Keys.

Jump with Spacebar.

Made for One Game a Month and the Indie Quilt Jam in July 2014. #indieQuilt

Like this game? Try my long term game project, Intergalactic Bubbles.
